game.name: Ninja Miner 2
game.description:
Looking for some gems and pearls in your kitty as you are ready for a massive treasure hunt in the mining genre of free adventure games online playing Ninja Miner 2. If memory of Ninja Miner one is still fresh in your mind, the second version of the treasure hunt game is not as simple and easier as you will have to face new difficulties.

Along with the quest of diamonds and treasures this version of cool free adventure game for all the age groups has many serious and life-threatening hurdles this time. As a benefactor of furious ninja you will have to guide him through the intractable mazes on mines, deep below the surface. As Ninja happens to be naturally a fast mover, in this version of free online game to play you can role him as much as possible as you like according to your wish and desire.

Another innovation attached with Ninja Miner 2 game are the left out caves that filled with water are not safe as you should take all the best safety measure to save him from drowning. Bats too in the dark tunnel are hazardous that can hamper you from playing this adventure games online to its next level. In addition to the game, never, forget to collect the golden stars as they are your surety to energize you to the next level of the game.

For the Game Control in Ninja Miner-2 mouse or the arrow keys can be used to guide the Ninja Miner.
